price: 62. Waxaan idin soo gaarsiiyaa Farriimaha (Alle) Rabbigay (iyo Rabbigiinba), waana idiin naseexeyn, waxaana ka ogahay xagga Alle waxaydaan ogayn.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمۡ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anṣaḥu lakum wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
